description: Episode of Series "Vassar studies: studies of normal personality development" The activities of 2-3 year old children in nursery school are followed through the seasons of the year and shows what children are like while they are learning and growing. It shows how teachers offer help by setting limits as well as by giving support and encouragement. Variety and suitability of play equipment for natural and constructive activity are indicated in the playroom and playground areas.
